metadata.name: Social Graphics Kit
notesInternal: Deliver ready-to-post examples + editable sources (Figma or Canva).
Keep scope tight: 12 static templates + headers/avatars + guide.

pricing.inclusions: Two consolidated review rounds; source files; export presets; usage guide.

rushOptions.name: Rush (+2 business days faster)
rushOptions.notes: Requires immediate feedback within 24h per round.

deliverables: 12 static templates (announcements, carousels, quotes, stats, promos)
LinkedIn header + YouTube banner + profile avatars
Usage guide (sizes, safe areas, alt text)

documentation: Usage guide (sizes, safe areas, alt text)

inclusions: 12 static social templates across agreed channels
1 LinkedIn header, 1 YouTube banner, profile/avatar set
exclusions: Stock images and font licenses (at-cost if requested)
assumptions: Brand assets (logo, colors, type) are provided and approved before design begins.
Feedback is consolidated per round within 24–48 hours.
Platform targets agreed during kickoff (e.g., IG, LinkedIn, X/Twitter, Facebook).
dependencies: Client provides brand guidelines and asset kit.
Access to Canva Brand Kit (if Canva delivery).
Approver list and turnaround expectations confirmed at kickoff.

tooling.handoff: Google Drive or Notion document links
tooling.versioning: Figma version history + change log in handoff doc
tooling.fonts: Client-provided or Google Fonts; commercial fonts licensed by client

risks: Scope creep from net-new visual direction requests after first pass.
Feedback from multiple stakeholders not consolidated.

changePolicy.minorChangesDefinition: Color/type tweaks, small layout refinements within existing templates.
majorChangesTriggers: Net-new visual direction after approval of direction
New template types beyond the 12 included
changePolicy.authorization: Email confirmation required prior to additional work.

acceptanceCriteria: All 12 templates delivered in editable source format (Figma or Canva).
Usage guide included with export presets and alt-text guidance.
Two review cycles completed or client signs off early.

addOns.name: Caption & headline copy support (5–10 posts)
addOns.notes: Headlines + short captions; aligns with approved voice and pillars.

addOns.name: Motion variants for 4 templates
addOns.notes: Light motion: fades, slides, kinetic type; export to MP4/webm.

addOns.name: Scheduling setup + content calendar
addOns.notes: Tool connection + 4-week calendar skeleton; no ongoing posting.

crossSell.reason: Tighten the brand kit for stronger visuals.
Add lightweight motion for key templates.

approvals.signOffMethod: Email summary or Notion approval block

securityLegal.ipOwnership: Granted upon full payment; excludes third-party licensed assets.
securityLegal.licenses: Stock/Fonts licensed to client’s organization; proof retained.
securityLegal.confidentiality: Work-in-progress artifacts are confidential until launch.
